mapper.insert: insert into Home_Banner( HomeBanner_ID, Banner_Title, Url, Links, Indexs, Statu, Admin_ID) values (#{id}, #{bannerTitle},#{url},#{links},#{indexs},#{statu}, #{optId})
mapper.select: select HomeBanner_ID from Home_Banner where Banner_Title=#{bannerTitle} and HomeBanner_ID != #{id}
mapper.update:
update Home_Banner
Banner_Title=#{bannerTitle},
Url=#{url},
Links=#{links},
Admin_ID=#{optId},
Opt_Date=now() ,
where HomeBanner_ID=#{id}
update Home_Banner set Statu=#{statu} where HomeBanner_ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select ifnull(Indexs,0) from Home_Banner order by Indexs desc limit 1
select hb.HomeBanner_ID, hb.Banner_Title, hb.Url, hb.Links, hb.Indexs, hb.Statu, hb.CreateTime, hb.Opt_Date from Home_Banner hb where hb.Statu = 1 limit 3
